Title: Omelette
Writer: Christopher Storer, Joanna Calo, Sofya Levitsky-Weitz
Actors: Jeremy Allen White, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ayo Edebiri
Plot: The Bear is set for its soft opening; Sydney feels pressured to impress her father; Carmy begins to second-guess things; Natalie informs Carmy that she has invited their mother.
